dialogue.message: Oh yeah, I think Wally needed your help. Could you go and talk to her? She lives in the general store north-east of the inn.
Hey, thanks for coming. My parents have gone on a business trip to Seashell Village, but its been a month and they haven't returned yet. Could you go search for them?
I forgot where Seashell Village was though. Head to the Altoris Mapmakers Lodge, Fleita knows where it is. The lodge is south-west from here.
What do you want to learn about?
Yes, Seashell Village is a small fishing town in Seashore Province. You can cross the bridge out of Altoris Island, and then head east to arrive at Seashell Village.

option1.message: Great! Now I know where to go.

dialogue.message: Just be careful. In Seashore Province, there are a lot of monsters.
